title: Large 1BR Near Hiking, Shopping, EZ Commuting, Security Bldg, +++
posting_body: We have a very nice one-bedroom apartment that will be available soon.
It is in a security building with an elevator, pool and laundry room.

The apartment is updated and has quartz counters in the kitchen and bathroom, large bright living room, big bedroom, lots of closets including a walk-in closet, dishwasher, large full-length balcony and much more.
It is in a very quiet building located on Carlmont Drive about one block from Carlmont Village Shopping Center, the public library and Waterdog Nature Preserve.
The rent includes water, sewer and trash collection.
No added fees at the end of the month.
No pets, no smoking, No barbecues.
For more information just give us a call.
The information can be found by clicking on "REPLY" at the top of this posting.
